 "title": "Design systems -- a brief overview and review"
---

Information Architeture: The semantic structure of the application
UX Architecture: The flow structure of the application
Design system: The visual structure of the application

## Information architecture
The semantic organization of an application or user interfaces. 

### Relations with Software Engineering 
- Database design (that is the semantic foundation from the domian)
- Domain driven design (that is where a lot of the foundational entities and relations are established)

## UX Architecture

### Relationship with Software Engineering
The state and flow enabled by the system architecture. 

## Design systems 
The visual foundation for consistent user interfaces and key enabler in supporting the information architecture (visual perception, cognition etc.)
